When it comes close to landing you should be able to decouple it and let it crash land (the pod). You would be able to land things easier on Dina just launch it like a mk1-2 and put a parachute on it and then hide a sky crane rover inside. First of all: FAIRINGS, not failings (Grammar matzo from Duna speaking). Unfortunately real rovers don't work like that. The. Curiosity rover had a cruise stage (On top of the areoshell), a heat shield (which fell away during reentry, a descent stage (the sky crane), and of course: the areoshell. If all you need is the areoshell, then mabey you should take a look at the Oblivion Areospace Pack, good luck.
